LanguageData.RF_Gun_Galil.label: 加利尔ACE轻机枪
LanguageData.RF_Gun_Galil.description: Ancient pattern military weapon. Good range, high power, low rate of fire.
LanguageData.RF_Gun_Galil.tools.0.label: 枪管
LanguageData.Gun_LMG.label: L-15轻机枪
LanguageData.Gun_LMG.tools.0.label: 枪管
LanguageData.Gun_HeavyCombatRifle.label: MA39X突击步枪
LanguageData.Gun_HeavyCombatRifle.description: MA39X突击步枪（也叫MA39XICWS单兵战斗武器系统） 是在UNSC（United Nations Space Command,联合国太空指挥部）授权下使用的一种近距离战斗武器系统。
LanguageData.Gun_HeavyCombatRifle.tools.0.label: 枪管
LanguageData.Gun_HHMG.label: M249班用机枪
LanguageData.Gun_HHMG.description: M249 LMG SAW MG, a heavy machinegun. It has a 120 round magazine and fires in 20 round bursts. Not very accurate but good at providing suppressing fire.
LanguageData.Gun_HHMG.tools.0.label: 枪管
LanguageData.Gun_Minigun.label: XM214速射机枪
LanguageData.Gun_Minigun.description: A multi-枪管 machine gun with an extremely high rate of fire. Mechanoid-built.
LanguageData.Gun_Minigun.tools.0.label: 枪管
LanguageData.Gun_M56_USCM.label: M56智能机枪
LanguageData.Gun_M56_USCM.description: The M56 Smartgun is a man-portable heavy machine gun with automatic targeting capabilities chambered for heavy ammunition. It is notably employed by the United States Colonial Marine Corps. It hurts like hell.
LanguageData.Gun_M56_USCM.tools.0.label: 枪管
